content.rendered:
Logging in and using the Banner system constitutes an agreement to abide by the University of La Verne’s Appropriate Use and Information Security/Confidentiality Policy regarding (among other things) information access, data confidentiality, and FERPA/HIPPA compliance. If you have not yet done so, please review the policy – violation of this or other University technology policies can lead to suspension of computing privileges and other disciplinary action as prescribed by University policy.
